verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that on a [certain] <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> He was <S%G1279>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> [some] <S%G4702>grainfields;<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G5089>picking<s%> and <S%G2068>eating<s%> the <S%G4719>heads<s%> [of grain,] <S%G5597>rubbing<s%> them in their <S%G5495>hands.<s%>
But <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> them <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Have you not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3698>when<s%> he was <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> he and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were with him,

<S%G5613>how<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G4286>consecrated<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for any to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to his <S%G3588>companions<s%> <S%G3326><s%>? "
And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>"

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about on <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> that He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> and was <S%G1321>teaching;<s%> and there was a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2532>whose<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G3584>withered.<s%>

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G3906>watching<s%> Him <S%G3906>closely,<s%> [to see] <S%G1487>if<s%> He <S%G2323>healed<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G2147>find<s%> [reason] to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> Him.

But He <S%G3609>knew<s%> <S%G1261>what<s%> they were <S%G1261>thinking,<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G435>man<s%> with the <S%G3584>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G1453>"Rise<s%> and <S%G2476>come<s%> <S%G1519>forward<s%><S%G3319>!<s%>" And he <S%G450>rose<s%> and <S%G2476>came<s%> forward.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G1905>ask<s%> you, is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> to <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>good,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G2554>do<s%> <S%G2554>harm,<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> it?"

And after <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G4017>around<s%> at them <S%G3956>all,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1614>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%G5495>hand!<s%>" And he <S%G4160>did<s%> [so;] and his <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored.<s%>

But they <S%G846>themselves<s%> were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G454>rage,<s%> and <S%G1255>discussed<s%> <S%G4314>together<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G302><s%> they might <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And it was at <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2250>time<s%> that He <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>off<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> and He <S%G1273>spent<s%> the <S%G1273>whole<s%> <S%G1273>night<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> He <S%G4377>called<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to Him; and <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> of them, <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3687>named<s%> as apostles: <S%G652><s%>

<S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> his <S%G80>brother;<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John;<s%> and <S%G5376>Philip<s%> and <S%G918>Bartholomew;<s%>
and <S%G3102>Matthew<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas;<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> [the son] of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon<s%> who was <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G2208>Zealot;<s%>
<S%G2455>Judas<s%> [the son] of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G4273>traitor.<s%>

And He <S%G2597>descended<s%> with them, and <S%G2476>stood<s%> on a <S%G3977>level<s%> <S%G5117>place;<s%> and [there was] a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>throng<s%> of <S%G2992>people<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2453>Judea<s%> and <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> and the <S%G3882>coastal<s%> <S%G3882>region<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> had <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> Him, and to be <S%G2390>healed<s%> of their <S%G3554>diseases;<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G1776>troubled<s%> with <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> were being <S%G2323>cured.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> were <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G681>touch<s%> Him, for <S%G1411>power<s%> was <S%G1831>coming<s%> from Him and <S%G2390>healing<s%> [them] <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And <S%G1869>turning<s%> His <S%G3788>gaze<s%> on His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> He [began] to <S%G3004>say,<s%> " <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> [are] you [who are] <S%G4434>poor,<s%> for <S%G5212>yours<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> [are] you who <S%G3983>hunger<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> for you shall be <S%G5526>satisfied.<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> [are] you who <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> for you shall <S%G1070>laugh.<s%>

<S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> are you <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> you, and <S%G873>ostracize<s%> you, and <S%G3679>cast<s%> <S%G3679>insults<s%> at you, and <S%G1544>spurn<s%> your <S%G3686>name<s%> as <S%G4190>evil,<s%> for the <S%G1752>sake<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man.<s%>

"Be <S%G5463>glad<s%> in that <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G4640>leap<s%> [for joy,] for <S%G2400>behold,<s%> your <S%G3408>reward<s%> is <S%G4183>great<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> for in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2596>way<s%> their <S%G3962>fathers<s%> used to <S%G4160>treat<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>
"But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you who are <S%G4145>rich,<s%> for you are <S%G568>receiving<s%> your <S%G3874>comfort<s%> in <S%G568>full.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you who are well-fed <S%G3568>now,<s%> for you shall be <S%G3983>hungry.<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> [to you] who <S%G1070>laugh<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> for you shall <S%G3996>mourn<s%> and <S%G2799>weep.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> [to you] <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> of you, for in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2596>way<s%> their <S%G3962>fathers<s%> used to <S%G4160>treat<s%> the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets.<s%>
"But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you who <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>good<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3404>hate<s%> you,
<S%G2127>bless<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2672>curse<s%> you, <S%G4336>pray<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1908>mistreat<s%> you.

"Whoever <S%G5180>hits<s%> you on the <S%G4600>cheek,<s%> <S%G3930>offer<s%> him the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> and whoever <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> your <S%G2440>coat,<s%> do not <S%G2967>withhold<s%> your <S%G5509>shirt<s%> from him <S%G2532>either.<s%>

<S%G1325>"Give<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G154>asks<s%> of you, and whoever <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G4674>yours,<s%> do not <S%G523>demand<s%> it <S%G523>back.<s%>
"And <S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> to <S%G4160>treat<s%> you, <S%G4160>treat<s%> them in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way.<s%>

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> you, <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>credit<s%> is [that] to you? For <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> them.

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>good<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>good<s%> to you, <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>credit<s%> is [that] to you? For <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same.<s%>

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G1155>lend<s%> to those from <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G1679>expect<s%> to <S%G2983>receive,<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5485>credit<s%> is [that] to you? <S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1155>lend<s%> to <S%G268>sinners,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G618>back<s%> the <S%G2470>same<s%> [amount.]

"But <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> and <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>good,<s%> and <S%G1155>lend,<s%> <S%G560>expecting<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> in <S%G560>return;<s%> and your <S%G3408>reward<s%> will be <S%G4183>great,<s%> and you will be <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G5310>Most<s%> <S%G5310>High;<s%> for He <S%G846>Himself<s%> is <S%G5543>kind<s%> to <S%G884>ungrateful<s%> and <S%G4190>evil<s%> [men.]
"Be <S%G3629>merciful,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as your <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G3629>merciful.<s%>

"And do not <S%G2919>judge<s%> and you will not be <S%G2919>judged;<s%> and do not <S%G2613>condemn,<s%> and you will not be <S%G2613>condemned;<s%> <S%G630>pardon,<s%> and you will be <S%G630>pardoned.<s%>

<S%G1325>"Give,<s%> and it will be <S%G1325>given<s%> to you; <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3358>measure,<s%> <S%G4085>pressed<s%> <S%G4085>down,<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G4531>together,<s%> <S%G5240>running<s%> <S%G5240>over,<s%> they will <S%G1325>pour<s%> into your <S%G2859>lap.<s%> For by your <S%G3358>standard<s%> of <S%G3354>measure<s%> it will be <S%G488>measured<s%> to you in <S%G488>return.<s%>"

And He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them: "A <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3385><s%> <S%G3594>guide<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man,<s%> can he? Will they not <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1706>fall<s%> into a <S%G999>pit<s%>?

"A <S%G3101>pupil<s%> is not <S%G5228>above<s%> his <S%G1320>teacher;<s%> but <S%G3956>everyone,<s%> after he has been <S%G2675>fully<s%> <S%G2675>trained,<s%> will be <S%G5613>like<s%> his <S%G1320>teacher.<s%>

"And <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G991>look<s%> at the <S%G2595>speck<s%> that is in your brother's <S%G3788>eye,<s%> but do not <S%G2657>notice<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> that is in your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%>?

"Or <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you <S%G3004>say<s%> to your <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G80>'Brother,<s%> <S%G863>let<s%> me <S%G1544>take<s%> out the <S%G2595>speck<s%> that is in your <S%G3788>eye,<s%>' when you <S%G846>yourself<s%> do not <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> that is in your own <S%G3788>eye<s%>? You <S%G5273>hypocrite,<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1544>take<s%> the <S%G1385>log<s%> out of your own <S%G3788>eye,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> you will <S%G1227>see<s%> <S%G1227>clearly<s%> to <S%G1544>take<s%> out the <S%G2595>speck<s%> that is in your brother's <S%G3788>eye.<s%>

"For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> which <S%G4160>produces<s%> <S%G4550>bad<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> <S%G3761>nor,<s%> on the <S%G3825>other<s%> <S%G3825>hand,<s%> a <S%G4550>bad<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> which <S%G4160>produces<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

"For <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> is <S%G1097>known<s%> by its <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%> For men do not <S%G4816>gather<s%> <S%G4810>figs<s%> from <S%G173>thorns,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> do they <S%G5166>pick<s%> <S%G4718>grapes<s%> from a <S%G942>briar<s%> <S%G942>bush.<s%>

"The <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> out of the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> of his <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G4393>brings<s%> <S%G4393>forth<s%> <S%G18>what<s%> is <S%G18>good;<s%> and the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [man] out of the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [treasure] <S%G4393>brings<s%> <S%G4393>forth<s%> <S%G4190>what<s%> is <S%G4190>evil;<s%> for his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> from that <S%G4051>which<s%> <S%G4051>fills<s%> his <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
"And <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2564>call<s%> Me, <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>' and do not <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>?

<S%G3956>"Everyone<s%> who <S%G2064>comes<s%> to Me, and <S%G191>hears<s%> My <S%G3056>words,<s%> and <S%G4160>acts<s%> upon them, I will <S%G5263>show<s%> you <S%G5101>whom<s%> he is like: <S%G3664><s%>

he is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3618>building<s%> a <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4626>dug<s%> <S%G900>deep<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%> upon the <S%G4073>rock;<s%> and when a <S%G4132>flood<s%> <S%G1096>rose,<s%> the <S%G4215>torrent<s%> <S%G4366>burst<s%> <S%G4366>against<s%> that <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G2480>could<s%> not <S%G4531>shake<s%> it, <S%G1223>because<s%> it had been <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G3618>built.<s%>

"But the one who has <S%G191>heard,<s%> and has not <S%G4160>acted<s%> [accordingly,] is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> upon the <S%G1093>ground<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> any <S%G2310>foundation;<s%> and the <S%G4215>torrent<s%> <S%G4366>burst<s%> <S%G4366>against<s%> it and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> it <S%G4844>collapsed,<s%> and the <S%G4485>ruin<s%> of that <S%G3614>house<s%> was <S%G3173>great.<s%>"
